div.p: It is the mission of the Ephrata Area School District to provide all students a secure learning environment and exemplary academic programs that inspire all students to reach their full potential.

div.p: We are on track to distribute nearly 50,000 meals this week, since we began on March 17. Today - thanks to @HersheyIC - all kids received a free ice cream cone too! More info on meal distribution including the sign-up link here: https://t.co/3nBTsoZgUU

div.p: It is the mission of the Ephrata Area School District to provide all students a secure learning environment and exemplary academic programs that inspire all students to reach their full potential.

803 Oak Boulevard | Ephrata, PA 17522
Phone: 717-721-1400 | Fax: 717-721-1514

Superintendent: Dr. Brian M. Troop

div.font: The Ephrata Area School District schools are closed through the remainder of this school year.
